---
title: "F1 Practice Report Generator"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

outdir="reports"
dir.create(outdir, showWarnings = FALSE)

```


The following function will render a report for a practice session.

```{r}
renderDoc = function(psession) {
  basefile="practice_template.Rmd"
  rmarkdown::render(basefile, params = list(psession = psession),
                    output_file =  paste0(outdir,'/practice_report_p', psession, '.md'),
                    )
}

```

```{r message=FALSE}
#For each practice, generate the report.
for (psession in c(1,2,3)) renderDoc(psession)
```
